mapper.insert: insert into t_member( no number primary key, id, name, pass, pass_chk, year, month, day, post_no, basic_addr, detail_addr, phone1, phone2, phone3, email, major, join_date, drop_check, drop_date, drop_reason, team, tech_leader, grade ) values ( seq_member_no.nextVal, #{id}, #{name}, #{pass}, #{pass_chk}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{post_no}, #{basic_addr}, #{detail_addr}, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, #{email}, #{major}, #{join_date}, #{drop_check}, #{drop_date}, #{drop_reason}, #{team}, #{tech_leader}, #{grade} )
